title: Christian Pastor Explains Why We Need Better Celebrity Atheist Videos and Conversations
description:
The YouTube Christian/Atheist game is one of the first Youtube sports. Watching the other side get pwned, cheering for your team. At some point, however, when it comes to your life, you want to figure out what you need and how to get it. We need better conversations, better arguments, better platforms for discover and less-cheap exploration.

The Christ Whisperer from @Rationality Rules https://youtu.be/pM17jVuiLZE
The Case against Santa Denialism https://youtu.be/APyGWnjBMos from @Sisyphus 55 
Mabelhttps://paulvanderklay.me/2009/10/03/mabel/
 from John Ortbert's The Life You've Always Wanted  https://amzn.to/2KAZoSA
Rod Dreher Jericho March https://www.theamericanconservative.com/dreher/what-i-saw-at-the-jericho-march/
The Cult of Christian Trumpism https://www.thegospelcoalition.org/article/cult-christian-trumpism/
Dominion by Tom Holland https://amzn.to/34np6Ru
Jordan Peterson at Lafayette College https://youtu.be/V32WHDuy-Do
Gene Wilder's Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory https://amzn.to/3gZoGFP
Justin Brierley @Unbelievable? https://www.premierchristianradio.com/Shows/Saturday/Unbelievable
John Vervaeke Awakening from the Meaning Crisis https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=54l8_ewcOlY&list=PLND1JCRq8Vuh3f0P5qjrSdb5eC1ZfZwWJ
Bridges of Meaning Discord Server Invitation 
Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here.

To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

To support Paul's work by supporting his church give here. https://tithe.ly/give?c=2160640
